root.name: The Magical Realms of Tír na nÓg: Escape from Necron 7 – Revenge of Cuchulainn: The Official Game of the Movie – Chapter 2 of the Hoopz Barkley SaGa
root.description: Overview"The Magical Realms of Tír na nÓg: Escape from Necron 7 – Revenge of Cuchulainn: The Official Game of the Movie – Chapter 2 of the Hoopz Barkley SaGa" is currently in development for PC by Tales of Game's Studios for a late 2013 release, funded by a successful Kickstarter campaign. It follows an amnesiac young man named X114JAM9 as he searches across the Post-Cyberpocalyptic Wasteland to find the Cyberdwarf and shut down the tyrannical A.I. Cuchulainn.GameplayUnlike Barkley Shut Up and Jam: Gaiden, which was a turn-based RPG, Chapter 2 of the Hoopz Barkley SaGa is a mouse controlled action RPG with weapon fusion elements, said to take inspiration from the Shin Megami Tensei series. Additionally, while "Barkley Shut Up and Jam: Gaiden" was a freeware game making liberal use of assets from other games, celebrity likenesses, and copyrighted characters, Tales of Game's Studios has explained that because Chapter 2 of the Hoopz Barkley SaGa will be an online retail product, it will feature all original assets and limited-to-no use of celebrity likenesses to avoid legal complications.

similar_games.game: Barkley, Shut Up and Jam: Gaiden
